text: Marc B. Nathanson (born May 12, 1945) is an American politician and businessman. He was the United States Ambassador to Norway from 2022 to 2024. He started the company Falcon Cable. In 2021, his net worth was $2.3 billion by Forbes Magazine. Nathanson was born in Los Angeles and raised in Glencoe, Illinois and Highland Park, Illinois. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Norway Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Illinois Category:Politicians from Highland Park, Illinois Category:People from Glencoe, Illinois
title: Marc Nathanson
